item.title: Sanam add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Years of love have been forgot, In the hatred of a minute." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Sometimes I’m terrified of my heart; of its constant hunger for whatever it is it wants. The way it stops and starts." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Men have called me mad; but the question is not yet settled, whether madness is or is not the loftiest intelligence– whether much that is glorious– whether all that is profound– does not spring from disease of thought– from moods of mind exalted at the expense of the general intellect." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "Don't tell me the moon is shining; show me the glint of light on broken glass." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "Any idiot can face a crisis; it's this day-to-day living that wears you out." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "When asked, "Why do you always wear black?", he said, "I am mourning for my life." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Sanam add a quote by A.P. Chekhov
item.description: "What a fine weather today! Can’t choose whether to drink tea or to hang myself." -- A.P. Chekhov

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "Man is what he believes." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "Perhaps the feelings that we experience when we are in love represent a normal state. Being in love shows a person who he should be." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "If you are afraid of loneliness, don't marry." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "A woman can become a man's friend only in the following stages - first an acquantaince, next a mistress, and only then a friend." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "If my life can ever be of any use to you, come and take it." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "I feel like a donkey, with a stick in my mouth and a carrot up my ass." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "And what does it mean -- dying? Perhaps man has a hundred senses, and only the five we know are lost at death, while the other ninety-five remain alive." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Love is so short, forgetting is so long." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Someday, somewhere - anywhere, unfailingly, you'll find yourself, and that, and only that, can be the happiest or bitterest hour of your life." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Denis Diderot
item.description:
"[L]e philosophe n'a jamais tué de prêtres et le prêtre a tué beaucoup de philosophes...
(The philosopher has never killed any priests, whereas the priest has killed a great many philosophers.)" -- Denis Diderot

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Denis Diderot
item.description: "One declaims endlessly against the passions; one imputes all of man's suffering to them. One forgets that they are also the source of all his pleasures." -- Denis Diderot

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Denis Diderot
item.description: "Every man has his dignity. I'm willing to forget mine, but at my own discretion and not when someone else tells me to." -- Denis Diderot

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The difference between genius and stupidity is; genius has its limits." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sanam add a quote by John Wayne
item.description: "Life's hard. It's even harder when you're stupid." -- John Wayne

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "We should all start to live before we get too old. Fear is stupid. So are regrets." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Sanam add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "That's the thing about girls. Every time they do something pretty, even if they're not much to look at, or even if they're sort of stupid, you fall in love with them, and then you never know where the hell you are. Girls. Jesus Christ. They can drive you crazy. They really can." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Søren Kierkegaard
item.description: "People demand freedom of speech as a compensation for the freedom of thought which they seldom use." -- Søren Kierkegaard

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Sanam add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda
